include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (SHA2_ARCHIVE "${SHA2_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/libsha2.a")

register_external_lib (libsha2 ${SHA2_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${SHA2_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${SHA2_BUILTIN_LOCATION}")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${SHA2_BUILTIN_LOCATION}")
